Description: Shoulder and neck fragment of North Ionian black-figured pottery krater; inside: neck glazed, reserved below; exterior: neck glazed on the right (handle zone); in panel to left, front paw of feline facing right; rosette fill; ridge at turn to shoulder; tongues, every fourth red, at top of shoulder; glazed area below with trace of added white.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), stratum AP30
Curator's comments: Marked by Petrie in pencil 'AP30', referring to a stratum in the Apollo sanctuary.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.511)
